title: Only Begotten Daughter - James Morrow.epub
description:
James Morrow imagines the advent of an unconventional saviorÃ¢â‚¬â€a female deityÃ¢â‚¬â€and chronicles her trials and temptations in a modern world gone mad

Rejoice! A new messiah has come, and her name is Julie. Born to Murray Katz, the solitary (and celibate) keeper of an abandoned lighthouse on the Jersey shore, our protagonist arrives on Earth boasting supernatural abilities evocative of her divine half brother, Jesus. As a child, she revels in her talent for walking on water, resurrecting dead crabs, and treating fireflies as luminous alphabet blocks. But after she reaches adolescence, her life becomes as challenging and ambiguous as any mortalÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s. Not only is Julie Katz obliged to deal with a silver-tongued devil and self-righteous neo-Christian zealots, she must also figure out what sort of mission her motherÃ¢â‚¬â€the female Supreme BeingÃ¢â‚¬â€has in mind for her.

At once outrageous and affirming, James MorrowÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Only Begotten Daughter is a magnificent work of contemporary satire that holds a mirror up to human nature, astutely reflecting our speciesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ failings, foibles, and often misguided affections.
